nodes.text: Ratri Tane was a male researcher from the planet Coruscant who worked for the Techno Union prior to the Clone Wars. He stole files from the Techno Union related to a droid prototype and was rescued by two Jedi named Ylenic It'kla and Aayla Secura. Jedi Master Nejaa Halcyon took Tane into hiding to keep him safe and assumed his identity during the Mission to Corellia. Halcyon's background while posing as Tane included having a wife and a child.
